alert.note: Alert for Paradox Valley, Lower Dolores River (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 17 at 3:49PM MDT by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central San Miguel County through 415 PM MDT... At 349 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 13 miles southwest of Norwood, or 45 miles southeast of La Sal, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of north central San Miguel County. This includes Colorado 141 between mile markers 37 and 53. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
